name: Training for Pokemon GO
description:
Practice catching in the pokemon GO style with this app: Catch simulator for Pokemon Go! Works online or offline. This is an unofficial fan app where you can practice Pokemon GO style catching. Throw the ball and catch the pokemon that appear on your screen.

You have to catch them in a row to raise your score. Once you miss one, your score reset. Catch 500 pokemon total in order to unlock master ball mode.

This is a fun, simple app that will keep you entertained when you cannot play pokemon GO.

Art credit to Master-Rainbow
